name: Roasted Cippolini Onions
description: —Chef Tom Valenti, excerpt from You Don't Have to Be Diabetic to Love This Cookbook [Flickr: 3liz4]...
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds cippolini onions (about 24 onions), peeled (see this page)
Pinch of freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a wide, deep, heavy bottomed, ovenproof pan over medium heat. Add the onions and cook, stirring, just until they begin to turn golden all over, about 5 minutes. Pour in the balsamic vinegar, season the onions with the salt and pepper and bring to a boil.

Transfer the pan to the oven and bake the onions, stirring them periodically to prevent scorching and ensure even cooking, until the vinegar is reduced to a syrupy glaze and the onions are meltingly soft, about 5 minutes. Serve the onions hot.
